title: Gold Rush Mining Kit Real PayDirt-12 Green Gold Pan-Vial-Snuffer-Tweezers-Loupe
features: This Panning Kit is Great for Young & Old alike
Kit includes a 12" Double Riffle Gold Pan
You will also receive some Real Yukon Gold to pan in your PayDirt
Also included is a Large Gold Vial - 5" Snuffer Bottle - Tweezers & a Loupe
description: This Gold Rush Mininers Panning Kit Special includes....1. 1-12" Double riffle Green Gold Pan for Clean-Up2. 1-Bag of real Paydirt with real gold added to practice with3. 1-5" Tall Snuffer bottle (Size may Vary)4. 1-Large 2-1/2" Tall Glass Gold Vial 5. 1-Set of 4-3/4" Long Tweezers6. 1-5X Power Loupe w/Keychain (Color may Vary)The Snuffer bottle with a seal and tube, the tube is used to suck up the gold and to put that gold in your Gold Vial all you do is remove the tube, shake & slowly squeeze the bottle with the top in your vial and the gold will transfer into your vial. The cap on the Snuffer is for Travel.
